languages.text: "Наше геносемя — особое! Расс благословил нас Волчьей спиралью, особым компонентом гена, что оттачивает наши чувства и инстинкты, словно моноклинок. Волчья спираль разжигает в наших сердцах кровожадное пламя, а облику придает сходство со смертоносными волками Фенриса".

"Our gene-seed is unique. Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a genetic gift that heightens our senses, making them sharper than those of brothers from other Chapters. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."
languages.original_text: "Наше геносемя — особое! Расс благословил нас Волчьей спиралью, особым компонентом гена, что оттачивает наши чувства и инстинкты, словно моноклинок. Волчья спираль разжигает в наших сердцах кровожадное пламя, а облику придает сходство со смертоносными волками Фенриса".

traits.locale_text: "Our gene-seed is unique! Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a special genetic component that hones our senses and instincts like a monosword. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

"Our gene-seed is unique! Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a special genetic component that hones our senses and instincts like a monosword. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

"Our gene-seed is unique! Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a special genetic component that hones our senses and instincts like a monosword. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

"Our gene-seed is unique. Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a genetic gift that heightens our senses, making them sharper than those of brothers from other Chapters. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

languages.text: “因为我们的基因种子独一无二！黎曼·鲁斯赐予了我们‘狼之螺旋’，这种特殊的基因磨砺了我们的感知能力，让我们比其他战团的其他兄弟更加敏锐。此外，狼之螺旋也点燃了我们心中嗜血的欲望，改变了我们的外表，让我们看起来与芬里斯的致命狼群很相似。”
languages.original_text: "Our gene-seed is unique. Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a genetic gift that heightens our senses, making them sharper than those of brothers from other Chapters. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: “因为我们的基因种子独一无二！黎曼·鲁斯赐予了我们‘狼之螺旋’，这种特殊的基因成分，可以像单分子剑一样磨砺我们的感知与本能。此外，狼之螺旋也点燃了我们心中嗜血的欲望，改变了我们的外表，让我们看起来与芬里斯的致命狼群很相似。”

languages.text: «¡Nuestra semilla genética es algo singular! Leman Russ nos bendijo con la Canis Helix, un don genético que afina nuestros sentidos e instintos más que los de los hermanos de otros capítulos. La Canis Helix despierta la sed de sangre en nuestros corazones y altera nuestro aspecto para que nos parezcamos a los mortíferos lobos de Fenris».
languages.original_text: "Our gene-seed is unique. Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a genetic gift that heightens our senses, making them sharper than those of brothers from other Chapters. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: «¡Nuestra semilla genética es algo singular! Leman Russ nos bendijo con la Canis Helix, un componente genético especial que afina nuestros sentidos e instintos como una monoespada. La Canis Helix despierta la sed de sangre en nuestros corazones y altera nuestro aspecto para que nos parezcamos a los mortíferos lobos de Fenris».

languages.text: 「俺達の遺伝種子は珍しい。レマン・ラスは俺達に牙狼遺伝子を授けた。生まれながらの才能のおかげで感覚が研ぎ澄まされて、他の戦団の同胞より鋭い感覚を持つんだ。牙狼遺伝子は俺達の心に血への渇望を燃え上がらせ、フェンリスの恐ろしい狼のような容姿に変えてしまう」
languages.original_text: "Our gene-seed is unique. Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a genetic gift that heightens our senses, making them sharper than those of brothers from other Chapters. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: 「俺達の遺伝種子はユニークなものだ！レマン・ラスは我々に牙狼遺伝子を授けた。一振りの剣のように感覚と本能を研ぎ澄ます特別な遺伝子成分だ。牙狼遺伝子は俺達の心に血への渇望を燃え上がらせ、フェンリスの恐ろしき狼のような容貌に変えるのだ」

languages.text: "Unsere Gensaat ist einzigartig. Leman Russ hat uns mit dem Canis Helix gesegnet, einem genetischen Geschenk, das unsere Sinne schärfern macht wie die der Brüder aus anderen Orden. Der Canis Helix entfacht in unseren Herzen einen Blutdurst und verändert unser Aussehen, sodass wir den tödlichen Wölfen von Fenris ähneln."
languages.original_text: "Our gene-seed is unique. Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a genetic gift that heightens our senses, making them sharper than those of brothers from other Chapters. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Gensaat ist einzigartig! Leman Russ hat uns mit dem Canis Helix gesegnet, einer speziellen genetischen Komponente, die unsere Sinne und Instinkte schärft wie ein Monoschwert. Der Canis Helix entfacht in unseren Herzen einen Blutdurst und verändert unser Aussehen, so dass wir den tödlichen Wölfen von Fenris ähneln."

languages.text: « Notre génogerme est unique. Leman Russ nous a fait don du Canis Helix, une mutation génétique qui décuple nos sens et les rend plus aiguisés que ceux des frères des autres chapitres. Le Canis Helix instille une soif de sang dans notre cœur et modifie notre apparence pour se rapprocher des terribles loups de Fenris. »
languages.original_text: "Our gene-seed is unique. Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a genetic gift that heightens our senses, making them sharper than those of brothers from other Chapters. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: « Notre génogerme est unique ! Leman Russ nous a bénis avec le Canis Helix, un composant génétique spécial qui aiguise nos sens et notre instinct comme une épée. Le Canis Helix instille une soif de sang dans notre cœur et modifie notre apparence pour la rapprocher des terribles loups de Fenris. »

languages.original_text: "Our gene-seed is unique. Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a genetic gift that heightens our senses, making them sharper than those of brothers from other Chapters. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

languages.text: "Gen tohumumuz eşsizdir. Leman Russ, bizleri hislerimizi güçlendiren ve diğer Tümenlerdeki kardeşlerden daha keskin kılan genetik armağan Canis Helix ile kutsamıştır. Canis Helix, kalbimizdeki kana susamışlığı uyandırır ve görünüşümüzü ölümcül Fenris kurtlarına benzeyecek şekilde değiştirir."
languages.original_text: "Our gene-seed is unique. Leman Russ blessed us with the Canis Helix, a genetic gift that heightens our senses, making them sharper than those of brothers from other Chapters. The Canis Helix kindles a bloodthirst in our hearts and changes our appearance to resemble the lethal wolves of Fenris."

traits.locale_text: "Gen tohumumuz eşsizdir. Leman Russ, bizleri hislerimizi güçlendiren ve diğer Tümenlerdeki kardeşlerden daha keskin hâle getiren genetik bir armağan olan Canis Helix ile kutsamıştır. Canis Helix, kalbimizdeki kana susamışlığı uyandırır ve görünüşümüzü ölümcül Fenris kurtlarına benzeyecek şekilde değiştirir."
